column1: Smoque BBQ////PPPPS - You know what? I really should have done this review as a music analogy.  Like you know how there were a ton of versions of Hound Dog?  And the Elvis version is okay and all
column2: but the Big Mama Thorton version is such an awesome different animal that it straight whoops Elvis's ass
column3: but how the Elvis version is waay better that wack ass Freddie Bell and the Bellboys version? Okay
column4: so at a real bbq place
column6: that would be like Big Mama Thorton and the Bellboys would be like The Patio or Arby's or Famous Daves or something.  Smoque would be almost like Elvis.  And what's wrong with that
column7: right? People like Elvis.  And good for them
